categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Weston Gavin is an American actor who portrayed Vlex Onopin in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
As an actor, his most notable appearance is in Superman: The Movie as a mugger and also featured other Star Wars actors such as John Hollis, Bruce Boa, Phil Brown, and Terence Stamp.
He currently lives in London as a singer.
